title: SOLD: T206 Cy Young - Portrait - Incredible!
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Cy Young - Portrait - Incredible!
posts.post_content:
As a result of significant cash needs for a different purchase, I sadly have to part ways with my only contemporary Cy Young card...but it's a beauty!!

I don't think you'll find a nicer example (for the grade).  Take a look at the scans and decide for yourself.

Asking $SOLD

First to PM or e-mail me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with an "I'll take it!" will be the new owner.  Paypal friend/family preferred.

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20Young%20T206%20Portrait.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1911%20Young%20T206%20Portrait%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]
Dave - The card is yours.  I received another "I'll take it" a mere two minutes after your "I'll take it".  Thanks for everyone's interest.
